page.title: 02AREAS AND BOUNDARIES
page.content: {AREAS AND BOUNDARIES WHICH AFFECT THE {VILLAGE OF SWANMORE:} Local Government is administered by{ {Hampshire County Council}through{ {Winchester City Council. The Parliamentary constituency is { {Fareham.} The parish is in the{Diocese of {Portsmouth,}which borders the Chichester Diocese in the East, Guildford Diocese in the North and Winchester Diocese in the West. The{Parish boundaries}are the River Meon to St. Clair's Farm and Cott Street Cottages in the East, Droxford borders and Swanmore Barn Farm in the North; Little Plymouth Copse including Hampton Farm in the West; to Waltham Chase in the South West and Gravel Hill and the River Meon at Mislingford in the South.
